metadata.title: CVE-2016-5038 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description:
The dwarf_get_macro_startend_file function in dwarf_macro5.c in libdwarfbefore 20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) via a crafted string offset for .debug_str.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
